Package sokobangame.model

Interface Summary
Maze Multiple layers of a two-dimensional grid, where each (x,y,layer) position is associated with zero or more MazeObjects.
MazeListener The listener interface for receiving notable events in the Maze - tiles changing or the maze entering a winning state.
 

Class Summary
ArrayMaze An implementation of the Maze interface that uses a 3-dimensional array of LinkedLists to store the Maze's objects.
MazeObject MazeObject is an abstract class that all objects in the Maze extend.
 

Enum Summary
MazeObject.Direction Simple enumeration of directions that maps each direction to a x/y offset.
